entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being frightened and grabbing Hermione's hand to help her up. He is also mentioned as having been in a life-threatening situation.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as struggling to get up from the wreckage and being helped by Harry.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as having been injured or killed, with Percy shaking him and Ron kneeling beside them.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is described as shaking his brother Fred in an attempt to revive him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as kneeling beside Fred and Percy, indicating that he is also concerned about Fred's well-being.

relationships.description: Harry helps Hermione up from the wreckage, grabbing her hand to support her.
Percy shakes his brother Fred in an attempt to revive him.
Ron kneels beside Fred and Percy, indicating that he is also concerned about Fred's well-being.
